headline: Has Walmart (WMT) Run Too Far After Its Strong Three Year Share Price Gain
summary: If you are wondering whether Walmart's current share price still offers value after a strong run, this article will walk through what the numbers actually suggest. Walmart's shares recently closed at US$119.36, with returns of 6.0% over the last 30 days, 29.3% over 1 year, and a very large 3 year gain, while the last 7 days show a modest 0.6% decline and year to date returns of 5.9%. Recent coverage has focused on Walmart's role within US consumer retail and how investors are treating large...
